content.description: Sit start with hands matched on the obvious shelf.  From there, work through a pair of crimps to a great pinch and the eventual solid lip topout.
content.protection: A pad, the landing is very good though.
content.location: This is on the Northwest corner of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on a flat jug. From there, go out to a right hand sidepull/pinch, cross over with the left to a flat jug, then thread a right hand incut sidepull (crux), work the feet up, hit the lip, and top it out.
content.protection: A pad or two, the landing has a rock that makes it a tad uneven.
content.location:
It climbs the center-west face of Mothership. It climbs just to the right of

Collusion Illusion

.

content.description: Sit start below the overhang with hands matched on the obvious shelf.  From there, move to a right hand crimp, then gain the left hand jug, bump up the right hand to another good crimp, and top out the problem using the small bumps atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad or two, there are a few rocks that may come into play, but an overall good landing.
content.location: This is in the center of boulder's west face.
